name: Deep Forge
description:
Developer's Note: This is an early development version of the game. All feedback is greatly appreciated as I work to add feature and polish the game. I hope you enjoy Deep Forge!

Description

Deep Forge is an idle clicker game with all original assets in which you play a blacksmith in the deep Dwarven mines. Perfect for people wanting to relax while on their PC

Features

  • Upgradable visual features
  • Game Saves

Upcoming Features

  • Research Table
  • Multibuy
  • Quests
  • Idle Offline Earnings
